adu poliyata naya labaganima, samruddhi panatha yatathe subhasadhana prathilabhayan sandaha illum kara athi ayata ee ayurinma prathilabha labaganimata hakiwi atha.pihituwanu labana nawa departhamenthuwa yatathe prathilabhinge pawule ayage aadayama ihala nanwima sandaha wyapruthi pahasukam, rakiya awastha, alewi katayuthu, janathawa athara ithiri kirime purudda wardhanaya kirima athulu waraprasada rashiyak da himiwe.diwi nanguma wadapiliwela yatathe sanwidhanagatha manawa saha bhauthika sampath prayojanayata ganimata aarakshawa salasa athi athara danata kriyathmaka samruddhi adhikari panathin laba di athi balathalawalata wada diwi nanguma sanwardhana departhamenthuwa yatathe idiripath kara athi panatha thulin balathala rashiyakma pawara thibimath, mema adhikariye sewaya karana sewakayin wenuwen da rajaye sewakayanta labadena waraprasada labadima thulin athigaru janadhipathithumage mema wadapiliwelata janatha prasadaya himiwanu atha..

janadhipathi m sirisena mahathawa hamuwi warthamana nawika hamudapathiwaraya mema lamun paharaganima pilibada asathyya thorathuru kiya atha.janadhipathiwaraya mewanawita pahadiliwama aparadhakaruwan wenuwen peni siti.aparadhaparikshana departhamenthuwe wimarshana walata badha karamin janadhipathiwaraya karannagoda athulu aparadhakaruwan aththadanguwata ganima walakwa atha.meyin pahadili wanne janadhipathi mukthiya pawichchikaramin maithripala sirisena mahatha rate nithiya yahapalana redda asse gasimayi.
